channel.title: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
channel.description:
Title ^.
How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down? By this I mean, when all the RSPS sites are shutdown, and there are no more servers online.
My guess is by 2012 if the world ends, and whenever Stellar Dawn get's released.
What about you guys? What do you think?

item.title: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

I think rsps will last longer then runescape but those 10 year olds that will probably turn to rsps will suck, not to mention we have to build our own models, no more stealing from jagex and i think only the really good programmers will be able to survive.

Read full topic
item.source: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?

item.title: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Forever I suppose, because only idiots get shut down by jagex. Also private servers should also increase at the release of stellar dawn, since runescape and stellar dawn use the same client and therefore the same private servers.

theres proof in 562 client u see stellar dawn crap all over it

example(client startup method)

client var_client = new client(); Class131_Sub2_Sub39.aClient6084 = var_client; var_client.method40((byte) 39, 562, 29, 32 - -Class214.anInt3138, 503, false, 765, ((Class126.anInt1696 ^ 0xffffffff) != -2 ? "runescape" : "stellardawn"));

Read full topic
item.source: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?

[quote=“n10si t, post:24, topic:344611”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=440985.msg3241581#msg3241581 date=1276975636]

If RuneScape closes when I get 20+

Then I will open a server, obviously with 800 Thousand GB (RAM)

And Vps that coast… um let’s see… 800 thousands? + BILLIONS OF PLAYERS + CHINA (Contains TRIBILLION PERON)

= !!! 10 Million - 10 Billion $ (PROBLEM IS CA$H ONLY!!!) !!!

Well, Need some water after this…
[/quote]Dude. Fail troll is fail.

So is pointing out the obvious.[/quote]Don’t even go there, because that could be said about any post at any time. I could even say that to your post.

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:14, topic:344611”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=440985.msg3239972#msg3239972 date=1276832534]

[quote author=Muroth link=topic=440985.msg3239556#msg3239556 date=1276806158]
My plan is to download all the popular sources and put in onto my external HDD so in 20 years i’ll still have RSPS(:
[/quote]You can’t be serious… there’s no way you care about rs that much.
[/quote]they could be worth something one day o.-[/quote]No they couldn’t. It’s not like in 20 years from now people won’t be able to code private servers any more, they will just keep making more. It won’t be rare or anything.

item.title: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Personally I think RuneScape shutting down would be good for RSPS in the short term (a few years) but bad in the long term. If the game gets un-popular, eventually the playerbase will dwindle.

Read full topic
item.source: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?

item.title: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Davidi2:

Yes, and what people fail to realize is that the player -> server ratio would most likely stay the same. I mean we were all players once, what’s to stop the newcomers from making there own servers?

That’s true. I’m sure many people coming over from RS would want the old game back, and begin to program their own servers as you said. However the player count would probably raise depending on how many people were still with Jagex.

Read full topic
item.source: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?

item.title: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:10, topic:344611”][quote author=John459 link=topic=440985.msg3239840#msg3239840 date=1276823127]

I do think RSPS will last till Jagex dies, or when he just wants to close RuneScape…

If Jagex closes RuneScape with a decent amount of players left playing, RSPS activity would skyrocket.

All the servers would crash though since no one has made one capable of holding 2000+ players for a long period of time.
[/quote]

Not yet, and I am sure it would come along sometime if the game really did crash. The only difference is we wouldn’t be stealing the protocol from Jagex, and instead making our own.[/quote]Yes, and what people fail to realize is that the player -> server ratio would most likely stay the same. I mean we were all players once, what’s to stop the newcomers from making there own servers?

Read full topic
item.source: How long do you think RSPS will last before everything get's shut down?
